venue.address_1: Parade and Hudson Streets, Providence, RI
venue.name: Dexter Field

item.description:
To all ... this is a volunteer activity to which there is no requirement. If you are willing to give your time and energy during the morning to help with cleaning up around the West Broadway Neighborhood, then I encourage you to attend.

For more information, and to also sign up with the West Broadway Neighborhood Association, please visit the following:

https://www.facebook.com/events/292419364163725/

UPDATE FROM THE ORGANIZERS:

Meet at Dexter Training Ground Park at Parade / Hudson Streets at 8:30am. Coffee is generously being provided by Equal Exchange Coffee and Hudson Street Delicatessen! Morning stretch led by YMCA!

Bring gloves, bags, and tools if you have them, but if you don't, they will be provided for you. Bring your friends! Bring your families! Have fun working together and making our neighborhood look fabulous for summer!

ALSO, bring your unwanted TVs, computers, printers, and other electronics to Dexter Training Ground for recycling between 8a-1230pm.

NEIGHBORS: If you canâ€™t attend but want to help, please sweep any debris onto the street for the street sweepers to pick up. Residents of Messer and Sycamore Streets, please sweep debris from behind the planter boxes into the street. SO HELPFUL!

Meet back at WBNA (1560 Westminster) at 12:30 for a cookout! Celebrate our success and unwind with your neighbors. We will have BOTH vegetarian and meat grill! If you are interested in volunteering to help with the cookout, please contact ECOLLINS93@aol.com.

This is a beloved annual event in our neighborhood & we hope to see you again!!

Extreme weather date for Clean Up: Sunday, April 29.

Special thanks to the following for making this event possible! *Equal Exchange Coffee *Hudson Street Deli *Providence Department of Public Works *ecoRI *Green Penguin *Providence Neighborhood Planting Program *West Broadway Neighborhood Association *and everyone who helps out!

For more information contact WBNA at 831-8344 or go to www.wbna.org.

Event Facebook:

https://www.facebook.com/events/292419364163725/
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be sporting a blue/gray rugby shirt with the #20 on the back
item.name: West Broadway Neighborhood Association Spring Clean Up
